argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lssnlm.x | |- X = ( W |`s U ) |
| 2 |  | lssnlm.s | |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 3 |  | #P_nvcnlm | |- ( W e. NrmVec -> W e. NrmMod ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_lssnlm | |- ( ( W e. NrmMod /\ U e. S ) -> X e. NrmMod ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( W e. NrmVec /\ U e. S ) -> X e. NrmMod ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` W ) = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_resssca | |- ( U e. S -> ( Scalar ` W ) = ( Scalar ` X ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( W e. NrmVec /\ U e. S ) -> ( Scalar ` W ) = ( Scalar ` X ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_nvclvec | |- ( W e. NrmVec -> W e. LVec ) |
| 10 | 6 | #P_lvecdrng | |- ( W e. LVec -> ( Scalar ` W ) e. DivRing ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( W e. NrmVec -> ( Scalar ` W ) e. DivRing ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( W e. NrmVec /\ U e. S ) -> ( Scalar ` W ) e. DivRing ) |
| 13 | 8, 12 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ( W e. NrmVec /\ U e. S ) -> ( Scalar ` X ) e. DivRing ) |
| 14 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` X ) = ( Scalar ` X ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_isnvc2 | |- ( X e. NrmVec <-> ( X e. NrmMod /\ ( Scalar ` X ) e. DivRing ) ) |
| 16 | 5, 13, 15 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( W e. NrmVec /\ U e. S ) -> X e. NrmVec ) |
